name: ROBBORY (yigitokko)
description:
ROBBORY is a 2D Platformer game made with Unity.

Help the robot trying to escape from wasteland while robbing away some coins and jewelry. There is not much use of coins for you except the satisfaction of finishing the level with 3 stars,  but the robot can surely make use of them when they finally escape. 

Every new level, you'll be introduced to a new character skill or some other effector in the world. See if you can finish all 6 levels.

Controls(can also be seen in the pause menu):

◘KeyboardGamepadMoveA DLeftStick Right/LeftJumpSpaceSouth Button(A)GlideWLeftStick UpCrouchSLeftStick DownDouble  JumpSpace x2 South Button(A) x2DashLeft ShiftRBPower JumpS + SpaceLeftStick Down + South Button(A)

Credits(can also be seen in the main menu):

Ruins Tileset by Penusbmic

Gems/Coins by La Red Games

Platformer Pack Redux by Kenney

Main Menu & Background Music by Abstraction

UI SFX by Kenney

Game Over and Level Complete SFX by Kenney

Fonts by Kenney
